text:
@senatemajldr how does GOP COVID-19 bill including

$2 B for F-35s
$1.75 B for an FBI building
$1 B for surveillance planes

$375 M for armored vehicles
$360 M for missile defense
$283 M for Apache helicopters 
$29 B for the Pentagon
100% deduction for 3-martini CEO lunches help families?
